title: Luxury 2 bedroom apartment for rent with NYC views
posting_body: ['Looking to escape Manhattan rent prices while still being within a 5 mile radius?', 'Look no further than this luxury rental located at the Galaxy Towers Luxury Condo Building.', 'This unit offers amazing views of the George Washington Bridge, Hudson River and NYC skyline.', 'One bedroom + den fully renovated with new carpeting, paint, closets and storage (7 closets total throughout apartment).', '1.5 bathrooms fully renovated with granite fixtures.', 'Wood flooring throughout apartment.', 'This unit is pet friendly (small dog/ cat).', 'Laundry room located next door to unit.', 'Rent includes all utilities and amenities!', "(Heat; Electric; A/C; Water; Gas) Amenities include 24 hour Concierge, Indoor and Outdoor Pools, Gym, Tennis Courts, Lounge, Children's Play Area and more!", "Seamless commute to NYC with NJ Transit bus stop at the building's doorstep and NY Waterway Ferry and LightRail Train less than a mile away.", 'The complex has an onsite mall with grocery store, pharmacy, preschool, ATM and restaurants.', 'Tenant is responsible for Wifi/Cable.', 'Landlord pays for utilities/ amenities.', 'Tenant is required to have rental insurance.', 'Owner pays for utilities and amenities.', 'Tenant responsible for cable/internet and required to show proof of rental insurance.', 'One year lease required.', 'Small dog (under 30 lb) or cat allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'Parking lot onsite with additional fee of $125/month.']
